Changelog
=========

1.1 (2010-06-30)
----------------

- The url to the archive view didn't work under virtual hosting. [lregebro]

- The portlets now also filter on content types. [lregebro]


1.0 (2010-06-05)
----------------

- Initial release

This version has been tested with Plone 3.3.4 and Plone 4.0b3.
